participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, she enjoys capturing moments through her lens.
participant_1.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly yet reserved, he enjoys simple pleasures and is passionate about music.
participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i have never been out of ohio. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.
